title: Was Rush Limbo the Coffid the General Cold?
subtitle: In one show in March 2020, Limbo also claimed to lie that news organizations were not reporting the low number of deaths at the time because it would make Trump look good.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: In February 2020, Rush Limbo said: "Yes, I'm dead on this right. The corona virus is the common cold, and people."
